entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Petawawa

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
